Attacks.Name: Elemental Cataclysm
Attacks.Effect: A devastating attack that combines water, fire, and electricity. Deals damage and applies Burn, Soaked, and Paralyzed conditions if a wild is rolled.

Attacks.Name: Temporal Roar
Attacks.Effect: A powerful roar that distorts time around the targets, reducing their defense and attack by 1 for their next activation. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Stunned condition.

Attacks.Name: Primal Surge
Attacks.Effect: Unleashes a surge of primal energy, dealing massive damage to all characters within range 2 of the target. If a wild is rolled, the battlefield is altered, creating barriers of ice and fire that last for one round.

Superpowers.Name: Aegis of Paradox
Superpowers.Effect: Grants immunity to all special conditions and adds +3 to defense rolls for one turn.

Superpowers.Name: Chrono Shift
Superpowers.Effect: Allows Paradox Beast to take an additional activation this turn, ignoring the usual turn sequence. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Attacks.Name: Fusion Flare Blitz
Attacks.Effect: A fiery and electrified charge that explodes on impact, dealing damage to the target and all adjacent characters. Characters hit are Burned and Paralyzed.

Attacks.Name: Draconic Vortex
Attacks.Effect: Creates a vortex that pulls all enemy characters within range 3 towards the center, applying the Confused condition.

Superpowers.Name: Dimensional Rift
Superpowers.Effect: Teleports Paradox Beast anywhere on the battlefield and causes a shockwave upon arrival, dealing 2 automatic damage to all characters within range 2. This superpower can be used only once per game.
